column2: Derby Men Charcoal Grey & White Pinstriped Slim Fit Shirt
column22:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • This uniquely crafted casual shirt from Derby has a perfect fit to get your whole look right. The texture of the soft cotton fabric is extremely comfortable and the trendy slim fit makes it a must-have for your wardrobe. Team it over a pair of well fit denims and sneakers for a relaxed look with an edge.

  • Product Details

  • Charcoal grey shirt with white pinstripes
